title: The empirical analysis on the influential factors of private enterprises' export trade under financial crisis
abstract: The global financial crisis had impacted profoundly on foreign trade of Coastal area private enterprises. According to the influential factors survey of Foreign Trade Development based on 117 Wenzhou private enterprises, by appling factor analysis and regression analysis a preliminary conclusion can be obtained that the factors of demand, exchange rate, barrier, competition and drawback will have varying degree impacts on enterprises' export business, export profit, export areas exchange collection risk, then some corresponding suggestions are provided on that basis.
